text: Geometrie pratique de l'ingenieur, ou L'art de mesurer, 1693 Clermont (16th century) was a French mathematician and military engineer. His books about practical geometry, Geometrie pratique de l'ingenieur, ou L'art de mesurer (1693) was a reference work reprinted for 60 years.
